TopicTitle: Do I have to scan asteroids

Articles.Content: Do they all have the same resources relative to weight or should I scan them first, if so which scanner should I use?

Asteroids don't have a SOI and do not come with their own gravity, in this regard they are essentially like starship parts. As a result you can neither get into polar orbit around an asteroid nor land on it, so none of the scanners can work anyway.

Just grab the asteroid and then it's simply "Drill, Baby, Drill!"

A stock asteroid simply has a finite amount of ore as "cargo" that is only accessible by drilling it.

You find out what that amount is by attaching your craft to the asteroid with a claw.
